name: 4Change, Cooperativa Cultural e de Solidariedade Social CRL.
goal: 4Change is a collaborative (cooperative) structure that work both as an NGO and a social sector consultancy collective. Within the mission of 4Change it is the development of local, global and European awareness raising on our common future - building active communities, strengthening participation and offering capacity building to maximize the social impact of ours, our partners and Social and Solidarity Economy actions. From our mission: 'facilitate social, economical and local transformation â€“ fostering social justice and equity'.
interests: Communication, Culture and media, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Migration and asylum, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Youth
euInitiatives:
4Change works in the areas of social impact assessment and management in both fields of societal and educational interventions.
Public policies on the social and education sector that relate to more effective and efficient, relevant and sustainable interventions are the core of our research and practice.
Eg1. 4Change is providing consultancy for the portuguese chapter of EU Social Fund (http://poise.portugal2020.pt/inicio) and the European Pillar of Social Rights https://ec.europa.eu/commission/priorities/deeper-and-fairer-economic-and-monetary-union/european-pillar-social-rights_en
Eg2. 4Change is following the debate, research and practice on Media Literacy and its application on formal and non-formal education (https://ec.europa.eu/culture/policy/audiovisual-policies/literacy_en) - and working locally to research and implement media literacy as a tool for civic education and critical thinking
